spec.description: Metal3RemediationSpec defines the desired state of Metal3Remediation.

retryLimit.description: Sets maximum number of remediation retries.

timeout.description: Sets the timeout between remediation retries.

status.description: Metal3RemediationStatus defines the observed state of Metal3Remediation.

lastRemediated.description: LastRemediated identifies when the host was last remediated

phase.description:
Phase represents the current phase of machine remediation.
E.g. Pending, Running, Done etc.

retryCount.description:
RetryCount can be used as a counter during the remediation.
Field can hold number of reboots etc.

exampleYAML:
apiVersion: infrastructure.cluster.x-k8s.io/v1beta1
kind: Metal3Remediation
metadata:
  name: example-metal3remediation
  namespace: default
spec:
  strategy: {}
